repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary of Sāyaṇācārya on the 4th Kāṇḍa of the Yajurveda. It is an incomplete manuscript. On the front guard folio there is a white paper on which is written in Granth : Vidyāraṇyi 4 kā the 3rd line is not legible. Patra 406 New paper glued over the cover guard, the information mentioned on the paper is Yajurvedabhāṣya (4th kāṇḍa) Veda. Vidyāraṇya is written in pencil . Granth P 406 7 L. incomplete. A half broken palm leaf before the front blank folio. Last folio is not numbered. Folio 1 is missing.

msItem.title: Yajurvedabhāṣya (4th kāṇḍa)
msItem.author: Vidyāraṇya Sāyaṇācārya
msItem.incipit: 2r 1 śarānassa ca vidyānāṃ bhutānāṃ paraḥ puntu sarvadā cidruśabdabrahmatanuśsivaḥ tatrodake prathame (gap of 4 syllables due to broken folio.)…
msItem.explicit: 204r 6 mtodho nibhṛta(1 illegible syllable.) vidhutā iti yuktāḥ sa tve (1 illegible syllable.) nāsmi yatidaṃ dharmmatvam tatreva yāsyāmaha (a few illegible syllables.)

extent.measure: 2 guard folio 3 blank folio and 203 folio written.

support.p: wooden guard folio as cover folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin on the vesro of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: folio 1 is missing. Some folio are broken and damaged text.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of the 2r.

listBibl.bibl: Sāyaṇācāryaviracitabhāṣyasameta Kṛṣṇayajurvedīyataittirīyasaṃhitā, Ānandāśrama Sanskrit granthavali, granthanka 42 edi. by kashinatha Shastri Agashe 1948 Anandashrama Pune. Available at archive org.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
2r 1 śarānassa ca vidyānāṃ bhutānāṃ paraḥ puntu sarvadā cidruśabdabrahmatanuśsivaḥ tatrodake prathame (gap of 4 syllables due to broken folio.)…
204r 6 mtodho nibhṛta(1 illegible syllable.) vidhutā iti yuktāḥ sa tve (1 illegible syllable.) nāsmi yatidaṃ dharmmatvam tatreva yāsyāmaha (a few illegible syllables.)
